mission_text: We are a dedicated community for competitive, good-mannered (GM) dueling on the permanent Non-Ladder realm. Our goal is to unite all PvP fans in one place to duel, compete, and improve.

feature3_list.item: Easy Sign-Ups: Simply click a button to register. No sign-up sheets, no hassle.
Official Announcements and Hall of Fame

feature2_list.item: Create Your Squad: Use simple commands to form your team and assign a captain.
Team ELO: Each team has its own ELO score to prove who is the most dominant group.
Direct Challenges: Formally challenge other teams and settle the score.

feature1_list.item: Sophisticated ELO System: Every match matters, with decisive victories giving bigger rewards.
Live Rankings: Watch your name climb the leaderboard in dedicated channels after every win.
Fair Play: Anti-farming measures ensure a balanced and competitive environment.

feature3_text: Get ready for glory! Admins can organize official tournaments with ease using our integrated event system.
feature2_text: Team combat is a cornerstone of our community. Our bot features a complete team management system for our 2v2, 3v3, and 4v4 ladders.
feature1_text: Forget spreadsheets and manual tracking. Our server features 13 unique competitive 1v1 and team ladders, all managed in real-time by our custom bot.
subtitle: The Home for Non-Ladder Diablo II: Resurrected PvP
title: D2R PvP Nexus
